resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing phone completions."
Please accept terms and conditions first.

Terms And Condition 
\ Afya-Plan is a platform that is designed to allow a group of women to come together in a chama where they contribute regularly after which they can get loans from the group to attend to their medical needs during pregnancy or the medical needs of their children.
\ Upon approval of a loan request by members, the funds will be transferred directly to the hospital via their M-PESA paybill. This is so as to avoid any form of hard cash handling.
\ Please understand that joining some chamas may require you to pay an initial fee as a registration while others may not necessarily require so. This fee amount is entirely controlled by the chama and not Afya-Plan. 
\ By ticking you accept to abide and follow the constitution of the chama you will be joining. Chamas will be strictly self-governed and never in any way will Afya-Plan interfere with their activities.

This section will display the statement for the chama.It will show at least 5 transactions that the chama members have been doing up until the request was made. It will have the transaction number,the time,the details (mainly the name of the member) and the amount deposited or borrowed for a particular transaction.
Have a group of women ready? Let us help you setup and invite everyone over
Already invited to a chama? Connect with your awaiting friends
Don\'t have a Chama? Don\'t worry, we will hold your hand and connect you with women you can call family
This section will contain details about this particular chama. This will various information ranging from the age group the members to help the searching mom find exactly what she is looking for.
